title: Cold Caller – Real Estate (Land Wholesaling) | Closify Offers Inc.
job_overview:
Are you a confident, articulate speaker with a neutral or great English accent? Do you want a consistent, full-time role with growth opportunities and weekly pay?

Closify Offers Inc. is a fast-growing U.S. real estate investment company focused on land deals — and we’re hiring Cold Callers to join our acquisitions team!

We provide scripts, leads, and full support — you bring the voice, drive, and consistency to help us grow.

???? Job Responsibilities:
Make outbound calls to landowners in the U.S. using our lead lists

Follow our script to identify motivated sellers

Ask qualifying questions and tag responses

Set call-back appointments for our closing team

Track lead status accurately and follow basic CRM procedures

Attend weekly check-ins and stay in communication with our team

???? Compensation:
$4.00 USD per hour, paid weekly via Wise or PayPal

36 hours a week of work! ( Full Time )

$5 bonus per qualified appointment you set

0.5% commission on any deal that closes from your lead

Paid training & potential for long-term promotion into higher roles (Lead Manager, Closer, etc.)

???? What We're Looking For:
Neutral or Great English Accent (U.S.-friendly tone, clear pronunciation)

1+ year of experience in cold calling, sales, telemarketing, or real estate preferred

Strong communication skills — able to follow scripts and handle objections professionally

Reliable internet connection, computer, and noise-canceling headset

Availability to work full-time (U.S. business hours)

Must be focused, consistent, and open to feedback

???? How to Apply (Read Carefully):
To be considered, please do the following:

Start your message with the keyword: Land Shark
(This helps us see who pays attention and follows instructions.)

Include a voice or video recording (1–2 minutes) using Vocaroo, Loom, or another link —

Introduce yourself

Tell us why you're a great fit for this role

? That’s it! No resume, no long paragraphs. Just the keyword + voice/video.

If your voice and energy are a match, we’ll send you our official application form and move you into the next round.

We’re looking for A-players who want to grow with a company that values communication, reliability, and performance. If that’s you — apply now and let’s close some deals together!
